divs: Sighting DetailsThe electricity had gone out in the rural area where I live. Siezing the momentof clear skys, I laid out in an open field on my back and was gazing at thebeautiful stars. After just a few moments maybe 10 minutes, an orangered Vappeared in the sky with stars above and below it. It was traveling rapidly in aSE direction, the legs of the V facing forward. It traveled almost out of mysight, then came back in the opposite direction. I did not stay to watch it anylonger as an intense fear overcame me. I ran inside and collapsed, curled up ina ball, not able to speak and had hyper-ventilated breathing. I have never beenso frightened in my life, and Ive seen UFOs several times throughout my lfe. Dont know what was so different about this one - why it frightened me sohorrifically.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Redwood Valley
There were no other sightings in Redwood Valley on or around August 29th 2003
